backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic; deployment handled externally.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature descriptions, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text summarizing frontend files and components for build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining prerequisites, IC naming rules, and standard deployment steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH theme configuration defining light and dark color tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/google81cfc97330838765.h: Google site verification file for ownership validation.
Node diagnostic build script running TypeScript checks and Vite build with colored logging and troubleshooting.
frontend/scripts/retry-deploy.sh: Bash script automating clean redeployment with name validation, cleanup steps, and error trapping.
frontend/scripts/validate-deploy-names.m: Node script validating IC canister naming rules in dfx.json and canister_ids.json.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component managing search, cart state, and layout composition for all major sections.
Displays an error message with optional primary and secondary action buttons.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches errors and shows an actionable error with a page refresh option.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-out cart UI showing items, totals, removal controls, and a WhatsApp checkout button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Website footer with company info, quick links, social icons, and a dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, search input, and cart button showing item count.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero banner with background image, headline, and a button that scrolls to the products section.
frontend/src/components/NoticeBar.tsx: Scrolling marquee bar displaying repeated service time notices.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card with image fallback logic, rating display, quantity controls, and cart or WhatsApp purchase actions.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Filters and displays a predefined list of products using ProductCard components based on the search query.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsSection.t: Displays customer reviews and a form to submit new ones using local state and UI components.
frontend/src/components/TrustSection.tsx: Renders a trust banner with safe checkout text and payment method icons.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Provides a floating WhatsApp contact button linking to a predefined phone number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a placeholder example React Query hook that depends on the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, dark mode values, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related build files like Vite and scripts.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React, aliasing, build settings, chunk splitting, and dev server proxy.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, storefront requirements, assets, and known deployment issues.
